directions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Add the spinach, prosciutto, red peppers and artichoke hearts. Season with garlic powder. Cook and stir for 15 minutes, until heated through.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
1 (4 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, drained and chopped
1 (6.5 ounce) jar artichoke hearts, drained and sliced
title: Colorful Spinach and Prosciutto Side
